content.detailedDescription: We were driving in the car when i noticed a black, somewhat flat object thatseemed to be hovering in the sky. i had no idea what it was becuase i had  never seen such an object before. at closer look i noticed that the objectseemed to rotate showing a reflective silver color on the other side. the objectwas round and saucer-like in appearance and never seemed to move except rotatingas long as i could see it. i lost sight of the object when we drove away.
content.summary: Silver and black disk silver one side, black on th

content.detailedDescription: We were driving on a stretch of highway about 540pm cst. when i, pete, observedan object in the sky that looked to be hovering.  i noticed it because it theobject wasd redblack against a bluewhite sky.  at first i thought the objectlooked like a hot air balloon but after further inspection, it was not.  myfirst reaction was to tell my friend to look at it the object so she could get abetter look at it since i was driving.  it looked like a disc or circle on endinstead of the so-called saucer shape.  when the object appeared to roate on itsaxis it became very hard to see when it turned sideways because it became thin. i lost sight because we were still driving on the higway and the object remainedand appeared to be hovering in the same spot when we first saw it.
content.summary: Saw reddish, on-end, circular, disc

content.detailedDescription: Glenwood, mn 11-29-03 observation and digital picture  preliminary report bywilliam i. mcneffwitness #1 (wife) wrote to brian vike hbbcufo:6pm saturday november 29, 2003.West central minnesota (near glenwood)five witnesses.They are back big time! i only got one really good picture. i have a bunch ofother shots but they are not as good.I saw bright flash in western sky. huge bright light. then it zips to asoutheast position. sits there.I yelled for (husband) and then for the boys who were having band practice. theobject had by then moved to a southwest position and just sat there. multiplelights flashing and appeared to be changing in shape. i will have each of themwrite up a separate statement.The object then sinks on the horizon very slowly. as if to land? this lasted agood total of 20 minutes as of us able to view it. and it was huge. biggest ihave ever seen for the distance.(husband) had to leave and the boys were a little shell-shocked. they justcouldnt believe what they saw. i continued to watch and a jet came in or atleast it sounded like one and i grabbed my camera and keys and went to my car topursue it. by the time i got down to the lake i no longer could see it or thejet. but it was huge!!!!Witness #2 (husband) submitted a couple of sketches showing what appears to be adisc-shaped craft with windows around the periphery, reminiscent of the barney &betty hill craft.  a bright vertical reflection from a central light or windowinside the binoculars is shown on one sketch.Witness #2 statement: i saw this with a pair of binoculars (7 x 50, field ofview 372 feet at 1000 yards).The reflection of light i saw seemed normal to me, the star type of reflection. but the horizontal lights were steady and clear.Witness #3 (son) submitted a sketch of what appears to be a disc seen edge-wise,with a row of round lights or windows, with a bright vertical reflection fromthe central light or lights.Witness #3 statement: i saw an object in the sky that my parents showed me. when i looked through their binoculars and seen it closer, it looked like thiswhen i saw it.  whatever it was, it wasnt a star, thats for sure, and i haveseen other stuff like this before too.
content.summary: Five witnesses see disc with lighted "windows", ph

content.detailedDescription: These people started freaking out down the street by the woods. i didnt knowwhat it was but upon closer inspection there were several forms running aroundthem. i was really scared but i managed to take a picture. it came out blank.The flash from the camera might have frightened them, because they got into thislittle pod thing and flew off in the blink of an eye. the people were ok, butone of them said he couldnt breath for about 20 seconds.
content.summary: Saw aliens run at unbelievable speeds

content.detailedDescription: I was driving south on trout brook drive in west hartford ct around 10 pm on172004 and i saw two very bright lights in the sky, hovering and moving slowlyabout 300 feet above the ground.  as an avid sky watcher, i am familiar with allof the planets and constellations and i know i did not mistake these objects for93venus94 or anything.  the moon was full, high in the sky and the sky was crystalclear.  i thought at first that they might be helicopters, but they were movingin a way that i have never seen a helicopter move...Hovering slowly in a sort ofcircular motion  one of the objects started moving away and i lost sight of it,so i focused on the other.  i had to turn my car around and follow it and itturned from one bright object into a triangular shaped form with three whitelights on each corner of the triangle and a few blinking red lights on it.  ipulled my car over to the side of the road, as did a bunch of other people totry to get a better look.  i rolled my window down to see if i could hearanything, but it was completely silent.  if it was a plane or helicopter, it wasclose enough where i would have definitely heard something.  at this point itwas much lower, probably 75-100 feet off the ground.  it hovered and movedslowly and i continued to watch it for another couple minutes until itdisappeared behind the tree line and i lost sight of it.  because of thelighting on the ground, i had a bit of a difficult time trying to decipher thedimensions, but i would have to guess that it was about 20 to 25 feet in lengthand about 10 feet in height.  it looked like it was black, but being dark, i92m not completely sure.
content.summary: 2 triangular crafts seen

content.detailedDescription: Narrative of witness provided to mufon.------------------------------------------------------ i was in duluth, ga in my neighborhood, coming home from a friends.  i wasadmiring the beautiful, clear sky and the outrageously full moon.  all of asudden i noticed these bright, white lights sorta of glide by.  it happened soquickly that it caught me off guard.  when i realized that the object attachedto the white lights was triangular, and large, i watched it for a few secondsand quickly turned onto my street.  at first i thought a big stealth (craft), itjustlooked really big and those lights were bright and had a circular ring aroundthe large round light in the middle of the suction cup.  at that point we weretravelling parallel to each other. it was ahead of me and a little above thetrees.  i sped up and realized it was going faster than it seemed.  at one pointthe trees blocked it and then it reappeared.  by the time i reached the end ofthe street, it started to ascend and bank ever so slightly and easily to theleft.  all the time i could see the four huge suction-cup-like lights underneathit.  one at each point of the triangle and one sort of in the middle.And then it was gone.During all this i was trying to get my cell phone out of my purse to call myfriend to hurry and run into the street, but it fell out of my hands onto thefloorboard.My windows were up and the radio on, so i dont know about the noise.  when ireached the end of the street, there were two neighbors standing on the cornerwith their dogs.  i didnt ask them if they just saw what i saw, i just keptgoing around the block.  i may go down and ask them tonight.That is pretty much it.When i got home, i called my friend, the police, channel 11 (local nbc) and thefernbankscience center.  nobody had any other calls about the object.  my friend saidwhat i described sounded like other sightings in the past three years.I saw a ufo in the late 60s, but it was very different shaped.....Round, with adome on top of it with a bank of windows.  this object was very different, verylarge.
content.summary: Triangle object w/huge "suction cup-like" light ar

content.detailedDescription: When leaving work and walking out to my car while talking to co-workers as i approached my car i looked up into north western sky and saw a circular bright object simular to a star moving eastward in sky. then 3 other circular objects either came out from behind or from inside object and hovered in a square shape in the sky. that's when i informed my co-workers to look up into sky. we all saw the 4 light in perfect square hovering in sky appeared to be about 1 to 2 miles up and away from us. then the 3 circular objects formed what looked like straight line then flew extremely fast outwards in different directions from the original object. within a minute or less they returned to the original object and appeared to have entered the object or went back behind it. then without any sound or change in structure it shot straight to northeast and then what looked like very extreme speed went straight up and disappeared very rapidly. there was no markings or planes in area no clouds for lights to bounce off of and the sky was dimly lit with very few stars.
content.summary: 4 dot coming out of one formed a square in sky

content.detailedDescription: Location x403900 m y92400 m504352n, 15645wgrid refsz039923accurate to 100 metresdate 06jan2004description at about 8pm on i stepped out of my shed no it wasnt full ofthinners fumesfacing towards my house and a movement above me and to my leftcaught my eye.As i looked up there was a single bright-white as bright as the moon, and alsodue to the perspective it appeared to be about the same size as the moonappeared last nightdisc which was moving away from me at an altitude whichtook it just into the sporadic low cloud cover, but still remaining visible. soit was at a fairly low altitude.In the space of about 1 second it travelled from just above me in a northeasterly direction it was coming over and past me and into the distance inlanduntil it was out of visual range. so it was moving very, very fast in a totallysmooth trajectory.It was silent.
content.summary: Bright white disc moving very fast at low altitude

content.detailedDescription: My wife kim was letting our dogs out to use bathroom outback, outside the wooden deck, she noticed a huge bright light, yelled for me, which i was on cpu at this time, i went out back, also saw this huge bright white light, knew it wasn't a star, it suddenly disappeared, only to reappear much closer, as it moved very slow over our house, we kept our eyes on it, until it simply disappeared, just southwest of our house, in pleasantlake, indiana, i told a couple of guys at work, the next day, they laughed, and now that they seen a report on news, they thought of what i had told them, and now are talking about what i told them. thank-you.
content.summary: 1025 pm. just after christmas, witnessed flying ob

content.detailedDescription: well, my friend and i regularly watch the nighttime sky for satelites and  regular star gazing.  we live about a half an hour north of toronto, ontario.   it was during my friends 19th birthday party that we were outside of the house  staring at the sky, my fiancee was looking in a westerly direction when she  exclaimed you guys will probably not beleive this but i just saw something  really weird.  well we did beleive her, she said it was roughly triangular  with 2 or 3 running lights.  that got our interest as she also said it was  flying very low, perhaps only a couple of hundred feet up  we began watching  the sky with a renewed interest, and it wasnt very long before we all 6 or 7  of us saw amazing things.  for about the next hour or so we saw what appeared  to be moving starsnot satelites, i know the difference, however they did not  behave like stars.  there were probably about 8 sightings that night, each one  different from the others.  there were single crafts, as well as formation  flying of 3 to 10 different craft at a time.  they were mostly visible as  points of light, but depending on the angle at which they passed us the shape  of the ship was more apparent.  sometimes they appeared to be fling completely  straight, other times they would jink about and wobble.  when they were in  formation, one would be in the lead while 2 or 3 would fly behind the first  swapping positions with each other in almost the same way that canada geese  fly.  occasionally there would be clusters of several individual lights moving  togethersometimes steady points of light other times they would fade in and  out.  except the first sighting of my fianceewhich was very low to the ground,  all the rest were at an altitude that small cessna planes might fly at.  they  were completely silent as we watched them come from the southfrom the toronto  area and pass over the house and continue in a roughly northern direction.   the objects vanished when they got close to the northern horizon.  there was  no vapour trail or any emissions visible.  i must say that for myself i felt  completely elated and overjoyed, feelings that warmed me inside as i watched  open mouthed.Our first sightingsthe one described above happened in march of 2002 @ 1030 pm,the next sighting was only a week later at the same location
content.summary: Formation flying of multiple orbs

content.detailedDescription: I was sitting in an outdoor hot tub facing east at approx 330pm with a friendwho faced north. i saw a bright light fly straight down from out of the skytoward the ground, then take an immediate right angle and disappeared behind asmall island, close to the ground. there are many small islands in that area.This light travelled faster than any other light ive ever seen. i was shockedyet calm and wondered what i saw.I have had many other ufo experiences, anti-gravity, out-of-body experiences,telepathy, remote viewing, interrogations by us man inviting me to join peopleinvolved with the development of advanced technologies shown to me by otherbeings.
content.summary: Ufo sighting over cordova bay in victoria bc octob

content.detailedDescription: My friend and i were hiking,and we heard what sounded like a wounded animalscreaming we jumped up on some rocks peered over and saw a hovering ship-cowbeneath screaming seemed unable to move.I alwaysed wondered why does he not runaway.To the right of ship on ground was a little fellow,my buddy got scared andtook off running.This was 27 or so years ago in sierra nev. mts.There is muchmore later in dreams but i feel better already just talking this much.I am amarried man and work for very large comp.For many years 1 daughter who teaches2nd grade i have a great life but something happened to me,and i want to know.Itdoes not rule my life if i never find out thats ok too.Maybe hypnosis i dontknowanyway    thank-you for listening     mr.Bryan gullickson
content.summary: I saw something 27yrs or so ago. object hovering over ground, ebe seen near cow.
Thunder like sound from a mass of lights

content.detailedDescription: We were drivin east on i10, from tucson,az, heade back to santa fe, nm. john wasdriving, i was just looking out the window.  we were about 10 miles west ofdeming, nm.  i saw someting ahead to the south.  it was bigger than an airplane,but not by much.  it looked kind of like an army helicoptor.  as we got closer,i could tell it hadnt moved. i thought that if it had been moving toward us, itwould have passed us by now.  when we got across from it, it was stillstationary.  i wantched it for a good 10 minutes.  at one time it seemed tochange shape, just for a coulple minutes.  it looked more like a saucer shapewith fuzzy whiteness above it.  the clouds behind it could have made thatappearance.  when we got into deming, we lost sight of it because of the housesand trees.  we were starving and went to eat.  when we left deming, we headedne on a shortcut road to hatch, nm.  i could then see the object again.  itappeared to be a little larger, and to be sitting higher above deming.John had only seen the object for a minute while we were driving into deming.I would like to know if anyone else saw this and reported it.  is that possible
content.summary: Rectangular box 2004

content.detailedDescription: I let the dog out and went into the back yard to take some clothes off the line.I put my shirt on because it was windy and cold. my house is on the hill lookingout over the santa anna river valley in orange county. i was looking at theneighborhood below when a bright streak of light just above the mountains andbelow the white cloud band caught my eye. it was a florescent green-blue streakthat lasted approx. 1-second. my initial reaction was a meteorite skimmed theupper atmoshpere. my second thought was an engine disintegrated. as i thoughtabout the event i determined that the distant cloud cover would probably obscurea distant meteorite skimming the outer atmosphere. in addition, the contrail wasto low to be a meteorite. it appeared to me to be the land and the clouds. as isaid, the contrail was a bright greenish-blue and very short in duration. iestimate the speed to be about 2000 mph going from east to west. if it was amechanical failure it wasnt a airplane because it was going to fast.
content.summary: Blue-green streak of light just above the mountain

content.detailedDescription: 1. we were driving entering the town of ranchita. 2. i noticed a bright light tomy left. i turned my head just in time to see very intense short tail of light.My son who was next to me was angled in that direction for a complete veiw. 3.Ufo 4. talked with my son too see if he saw the same thing.5. the saucerappeared and disappeared in about one second, the tail also disappeared.6. theobject vanished i only assume it was traveling due to the light tail behind thesaucer.
content.summary: Saw very bright silver disk 1-03-04

content.detailedDescription: At first i want to apoligize my bad englishmy friend and me looked at this evening up into the sky, and we saw an object, ithink it was as big as the planet mars. it moved from our point of view asquickly as as a satellite does, looking from earth. it moved from west to east.Suddenly it changed its direction to north 90 degrees and after, i think 10secondes, again to east 90 degrees.I often look after satellites and other things, but i never saw an object whichchanged its direction so directly.Another thing your websites doesnb4t work correctly, stateprovince is madatory, even for no us-habitants ichoosed al.By the way, let me say another thingi wonder why i can give this message to you, but to get the full access i haveto pay.-the story at the beginning is aboslutely true. my friend is able to confirmthis.Best regardsp. schmitz
content.summary: Moving star

content.detailedDescription: Several weeks ago i sent in a report about white stars with alternatingpulsating red, blue and sometimes green lights that several of us at work on thenight shift had been seeing since august.  these were observed with our nakedeyes.  tonight someone had a pair of expensive, high-powered binoculars. tommyand 5 of our adolescent customers looked through them and noticed the evenlypulsating lights and then told me about them.  i went outside with one of thecustomers and looked at the star.  it was very clear and easy to see.  the starwas steady and almost a flourescent white.  it had a red pulsating light in theupper left hand side and a blue pulsating light in the center below the star. these red and blue lights pulsated alternately very quickly.  it seemed likeabout two cyclesl of alternating pulses per second.  also, as i stated in myfirst report, these stars do not move across the heavens with the normalconstallations and stars throughout the night.  i go out several times duringthe night, and as the normal stars move across the sky, these stars with thepulsating lights are in the same spot every time i see them throughout thenight.  our skies are usually clear here in yuma and the visibility is usuallyat 10,000 feet according to the weather station at the marine base.  tonight ijust observed one of these stars, but on many occasions there have been as manyas 5 at one time. i just wanted to make this update of my earlier report withthe added clarity seen with these great binoculars.
content.summary: Pulsating lights 112004

content.detailedDescription: I was in my house watching television because i couldnt sleep. i had to let mycat out and i looked up at the stars. i thought the object was just a verybright star. i was calm yet scared. when i saw it, there appeared two brightlights on the same object. then it turned and headed south. then it turned and isaw the back of it. there were five rocket engines. then my mind connected withthe creatures. i saw a reptile-like creature and it turned and walked away. iregained my own sight and saw two smaller lights. they got bright and vanished.Before the bigger ship vanished, the creature told me not to be afraid and i sawhim grin. a second later the ship got bright and vanished. i know it sounds likesci-fi story but its true.
content.summary: Starship escorts

content.detailedDescription: Looked out back window and observed a silver pulsing light move at a an angleto my right blink dissapear, and move again blink, moved again appearedloved again and disapeared. i was amased at how fast it was moving. i waitedfot it to appear again but it was gone.I checked again to see if it came backbut it did not.It was silver,white in color with what appeared to have windowsfacing me.
content.summary: Saw on silver blinking object move across and disa

content.detailedDescription: My friend and i were at our wharehouse, which is right next to the panama cityairport. i am a student pilot, and we were talking about that. i looked at theobject, and believed it to be a star. we talked for a few more minutes, and ithought i saw the star move. i stared at it for a minute, then my friendwatched. the star then moved closer to us until it was almost over head. itbegan to glow very bright, with a blue tint. it then shot straight up anddisapeared. i called my girlfriend and told her what had happened. i did notgive my friends info because amazingly, he doesnt remember the incident at all
content.summary: Fake star

content.detailedDescription: On december 28, 2003 at approximately 2025 hours local, i took our dogs outsidebefore going to bed for the evening. while coming out our door i noticed a tightcluster of lights with a strobe in the western sky. i went inside to get my 8x35binoculars to have a closer look because this didn92t look like normal aircraft running lights.While looking at the object i realized it was actually two tight clusters oflighta larger one on the left and a smaller one immediately to the right. the one onthe right had the strobe. initially i thought it was a military aircraft with achase plane, but after watching it move, it appeared to be he same object, justilluminated on two different areas of the object.The general direction of flight was north to south from my viewing position atapproximately 20 - 30 degrees above the western horizon. there was very lighthaze outside, but not enough to obscure the stars and the moon. the object madeno sound.Because this aircraft was flying, it changed its position relative to my viewingposition, therefore what i saw also changed. as it flew, the configuration oftwo clusters of lights changed to a triangular configuration, then to a straightline of three lights. a few minutes later it appeared to fly to the southwestand i am assuming directly away from me. the view of the lights at this time was4 or 5 white to yellow-white lights forming a low angle arc. the lights strobedflashed from left to right. there was a haze or aura around it, but i dismissedthis haze due to the general haze in the area. still no sound was heard. novapor trails were left. i observed it until the tree lined obscured viewing. theentire duration was ca.10 minutes. the temperature was 32 f, the barometer was29.783, and the winds were ene at 3 mph.Our location is directly under the path for commercial aircraft flying to andfrom european destinations, these commercial flights are generally directlyoverhead flying at altitude. most of these aircraft can be heard and most leavevapor trails. occasionally we have helicopter traffic performing border patrolduty. the uscanadian border is one mile away. the four nearest airports areedmundston, new brunswick, frenchville, maine, st. leonard, new brunswick, andcaribou, maine. all are for private aircraft. the last aurora activity we hadwas november 2003. loring air force base is closed.Rough sketches will be forthcoming.Thank you.
content.summary: Silent lights in the sky changing shape and direct

content.detailedDescription: this happened a long time ago but it started to bother me because my friend  forgot about the sighting. we were vacationing in running springs,ca. in  either 68 or 69. we were returning to the cabin, walking down the street in  the woods, when a bright light appeared over us. we were instantly afraid and  we crawled under bushes there. it went away and we finally got up and  continued walking. the funny thing was that even though we remained friends  for years we didnt talk about it.I saw her and her husband for dinner in 2000 and laughingly commented on the ufoexperience but her face got a funny look on it and she said she didnt rememberanything about it.I think it scared both of us at that time.Her because shedidnt remember and me because i did.Hope you can use this.Jan
content.summary: Running springs,california

content.detailedDescription: I was at low field ft rucker al. working out side at night, as an aircraftmechanic.2-had no reason to look i just did and saw it.3-had no idea then andstill dont.4-amazed and left with a great amount of wonder.5-it came from aneast dirction going in a west direction. moving so fast it was difficult or nextto impossible to show it to some one else. it moved an a steight line,at avery,very,high rate of speed to say the least. it appeared to be about the sizeof a soft ball maybe up to a volly ball,redorange in color, with a long glowingred or orange tail. the tail looked like red hot sand cooling off, this lastedlonger than the time it took the ball to cross the sky.This occured 3 nights oneafter the other, but from slightly different directions.
content.summary: Fast moving object  in nightime sky

content.summary: My encounter

content.detailedDescription: I was riding my bike by the side of my high school.  it was between 1500 and1700 hours.  i started feeling changes mentally and physically, and somethingmade me look up.  the saucer appered to have been observing me.  at this time ibegan to feel a sence of telepathy, so i decided out of curiosity to send amental message to it.  nothing complex, just a simple hello.  as i sent mymessage, i felt like there were voices in my head.  without warning the ufocloaked.  it was like someone passed something in front of it, because it fadedaway from left to right.  ive had a long history of beleving ive been aducted,because of things like scoop marks and strange markings.  if i am beingabducted, this is the third time ive seen them.
content.summary: Cloaking tech in ufos

content.detailedDescription: My wife took the picture from our yard in garwood, texas on nov 11, 2002 at637pm.She heard, then noticed, an airliner overhead were in some flight paths forhouston airports and looked up.  the airliner and this object were fairly highin the sky, but the airliner moved out of her field of view.  by the time shegot the camera, the object was even further away, but still visible when shetook the photo digital.She described it as looking like a rocket, but with no fins or wings.  it wascylindrical in shape, white with a red stripe around the center.  she continuedto wonder about its appearance, particularly the no fins.  also, it appeared tobe blunt on both ends.
content.summary: White, cylindrical object in daytime sky

content.detailedDescription: 1 sitting on front poarch.2 looking up at sky and object suddenly appeared.3 a large meteor.4 followed it with my eyes from the ne sky until it disappeared in the directionof the gulf of mexico.5 huge - possiblly the size of a bus or larger, grewy rock-like in appearance.It was emmiting smoke, blue, yellow and red, and rotating clockwise and movingsouth. it was almost symeterical.6 kept moving until i could no longer see it.After witnessing this, i called sheriffs department, newspaper and coast guard,as well as air control, everyone was disinterested.
content.summary: Very large grey rock type meteor, i could have sho

content.detailedDescription: Basically it was a three night ordeal and they came back on three sucessiveevenings. i knew them from before but it was locked in my memory, so i trustedthem eventhough being afraid and all the extreme strangeness..Somehow i was alsoposessed by an other spirit thaat calmed me. i wrote it all down for five yearswhile remaining in contact. i am still in contact today but they arent puttingon as big of a show really, but have a feeling i might be seeing them again..Maby finally get some pictures of a ufo . ijust have this spirit guide thathas been a mentor and i have a feeling soon might be in for a few more surprisessince they often say stuff like get ready for contact and just sort of leadingme to believe maby soon..All the news on the history channel and stuff. ifinally got a digital camera and hope to get something. here is my story httpjeeze1999.00sf.Commark
content.summary: Was visited in my trailer
